trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed, when printing from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controla como o documento será impresso, quando imprimir a partir de um aplicativo Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, PrintController controls how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, PrintController controles como um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>é impresso.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName> invokes the print controller's <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> methods, which in turn tell the printer how to print the document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>invoca o controlador impressão <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>, e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>métodos, que por sua vez indicam a impressora como imprimir o documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.Print%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Print preview uses a specialized PrintController.
trans-unit.target: Visualização de impressão usa um PrintController especializada.

trans-unit.source: For an example of a print controller that is specialized for print preview, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de um controlador de impressão é especializado para visualização de impressão, consulte <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: PrintController is used by <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, and not typically used directly.
trans-unit.target: PrintController é usado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>e normalmente não são usadas diretamente.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes three print controllers that are derived from PrintController that help accomplish common tasks.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework inclui três controladores impressão que são derivados de PrintController que ajudam a realizar tarefas comuns.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController> prints a document to a printer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>imprime um documento para uma impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.StandardPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController> generates a preview of what the document will look like when printed and is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> classes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>gera uma visualização de documento aparência quando impresso e é usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog>classes.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintPreviewControl> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PreviewPrintController>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> provides a printing status dialog during the printing process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>fornece uma caixa de diálogo status impressão durante o processo de impressão.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir com formulários do Windows, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Visão geral do namespace.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser imprimir a partir de um aplicativo do Windows Presentation Foundation, consulte o <xref:System.Printing>namespace.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> é usado para a visualização de impressão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir uma página de um documento.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPage is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPage é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se uma exceção é gerada dentro de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>eventos de um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage não for chamado.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é enviado para a impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método para definir como imprimir uma página em um documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) The OnEndPage method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode ajustar as configurações de página separadamente para cada página.) O método OnEndPage limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, conclui a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: OnEndPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnEndPrint é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é enviado para a impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>método para determinar quando e como imprimir um documento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the OnEndPrint method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode programar a impressão para 30 minutos ou ajustar as configurações de impressora para o documento.) O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o método OnEndPrint desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir uma página de um documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPage is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPage é chamado imediatamente antes do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é enviado para a impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics></xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the OnStartPage method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>é chamado, os conjuntos de método OnStartPage de <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>a um gráfico de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPage method to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Use o método OnStartPage para definir como imprimir uma página em um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode ajustar as configurações de página separadamente para cada página.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> que representa uma página de um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, inicia a sequência de controle que determina quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint é chamado imediatamente após o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>gera o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use the OnStartPrint method to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Use o método OnStartPrint para determinar quando e como imprimir um documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode programar a impressão para 30 minutos ou ajustar as configurações de impressora para o documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint cria o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>que é enviado para a impressora.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> to one of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Depois OnStartPrint é chamado, o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>método define o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>para um de uma única página.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, while the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>método limpa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>, enquanto o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A>método desaloca o objeto.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: O método OnStartPrint é um bom lugar para verificar se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>são válidos.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> que representa o documento que está sendo impresso no momento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados de evento.
